title: Hello!
text:
I am a researcher at the Tax Policy Center at the Urban Institute.
I work on microsimulation modeling, quantitative analysis, and data visualization, focusing on refundable tax credits for low-income families and children, and the interplay between federal, state, and local tax and budget policy.
I’m excited about blending subject matter knowledge and code-first data science methods to build better tools and workflows for tax researchers.
Outside of work I can be found geeking out about public transit or at a movie theater.
